stimulusHtml: Doug is part of a large creative-design team at an advertising firm. The team comes up with many slogans for products. Some are successful; some are failures. Whenever the team comes up with a winner, Doug takes full responsibility and talks about how much of a role he played in the teamâ€™s success. When slogans are not effective, he denies having a big role in the project. Doug is most clearly demonstrating
